content: A puzzle for you: Can you think of a single word that refers to a person who embarks on a pilgrimage to a sacred destination, but only if they have reached a specific age milestone of eight decades? Take your time to ponder and see if you can come up with the answer.

Certainly! The word you're looking for is "octogenarian pilgrim." An octogenarian is someone who is between 80 and 89 years old, so an octogenarian pilgrim would specifically refer to a person who is 80 years or older and is embarking on a pilgrimage to a sacred destination.
